nodes.text: Task Force Apex was one of five task forces of the New Republic Defense Fleet's Fourth Battle Group.

During the Black Fleet Crisis, Apex was placed under the temporary command of the Fifth Battle Group and led by Commodore Farley Carson from Yakez. It served in General Etahn A'baht's plan that culminated in Operation Strong Hand.
Yakez and all hands were lost during the Battle of N'zoth.
